{'category': 'Video_Images', 'limit': 10.response: The 'Get Products in Category' API enables users to browse products specifically within a chosen category. Given the input parameters, this API call targets products categorized under 'Video_Images', with the user requesting to view the first 10 products in this category, starting from the beginning without skipping any. This functionality is particularly useful for users who wish to explore available products related to video and image services offered by the betting platforms, facilitating a more focused and efficient search process. By setting a limit and skip parameter, users can efficiently paginate through the vast selection of products, ensuring they can find exactly what they're looking for without being overwhelmed by the full range of options.
